column4: I installed Ubuntu 6.06 successfully last night, but the supplied 2.6.15-23-server SMP kernel will not boot...  tried to just drop in the installers kernel and that doesn't work.  Where can I get a kernel which will boot my VIA C3 piece of crap? I'm sitting in rescue mode right now...
make sure you _don't_ install the 686 or k7 kernel
i don't believe i had a choice.
